Package io.mpos.accessories

Interface Summary
Accessory An accessory contains all information related to a specific accessory connection.
AccessoryDetails Object wrapping details of the accessory.
AccessoryOptions Options that will be provided for opening a connection
AccessoryOptionsFactory Factory able to create new accessory options.
AccessoryUpdateRequirement The result of an update check for the accessory.
 

Enum Summary
AccessoryBatteryState The battery state of the accessory, if available
AccessoryCategory The category of an accessory.
AccessoryConnectionState The connection state of the accessory
AccessoryConnectionType The connection used for the accessory
AccessoryFamily The product family an accessory belongs to.
AccessoryState Workflow states the accessory can be in.
AccessoryType The type of accessory
AccessoryUpdateRequirementComponent The components that might require an update.
AccessoryUpdateRequirementStatus The result of an update check for the accessory
